definition: to store/to stand/space between the door and the entrance screen

sentences.english: One day we must say goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 鴯羜總有一天我們都要說再見。

sentences.english: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
sentences.chinese: 贓羜每一個沐浴在愛河中的人都是詩人。

sentences.english: This kind of device is much needed in the mechanical watch-making industry.
sentences.chinese: 這種裝置在機羜械表製造工業中是很需要的。

sentences.english: Love shouldn't fall in love with the people, but the helpless put not hand.
sentences.chinese: 贓羜愛着不該愛上的人，卻無可奈何的放不了手。

sentences.english: May your love soar on the wings of a dove in flight.
sentences.chinese: 鴯羜願你的愛乘着飛翔的白鴿，展翅高飛。

sentences.english: Having a calm smile to face with being disdained indicates kind of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 贓羜被輕蔑的時候能平靜的一笑，這是一種自信。

sentences.english: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is mystery. Today is a gift.
sentences.chinese: 鴯羜昨日成歷史，明日尚爲謎，唯今日是饋贈。

sentences.english: Time will never change and stop for any person.
sentences.chinese: 贓羜時間不給任何人情面，也不會爲誰而停留。

sentences.english: Who is able to be egotistical needs to be strong too.
sentences.chinese: 鴯羜有本事任性的人，也會有本事堅強。

sentences.english: That I exist is a perpetual surprise which is life.
sentences.chinese: 蕗羜我的存在，對我是一個永久的神奇，這就是生活。

sentences.english: Do not take the memory of the past, to torture yourself now.
sentences.chinese: 鴯羜不要拿過去的記憶，來折磨現在的自己。

definition: a kind of mosquito net/bed curtain
to be unable to reach one's aim/to be full of misfortune
